description: Looking for an easy, festive drink to celebrate St Patrick's Day? The Shamrock Juice is perfect! This recipe calls for&nbsp;gin,&nbsp;vodka,&nbsp;rum or&nbsp;tequila with blue curacao. It'll get you in the spirit of celebrations quick and efficiently without any fussing around trying find good drinks at parties. Enjoy!
